languages.text: "Великий путь для той, что была рождена невольницей Империума, но предпочла предопределенной судьбе перемены, обещанные Пределом рассвета".
"A great path for one who was born into the Imperium's bondage but shunned her predestination in favour of the changes promised by the Edge of Daybreak."
languages.original_text: "Великий путь для той, что была рождена невольницей Империума, но предпочла предопределенной судьбе перемены, обещанные Пределом рассвета".

traits.locale_text: "A great path for one who was born into the Imperium's bondage but shunned her predestination in favour of the changes promised by the Edge of Daybreak."
"A great path for one who was born into the Imperium's bondage but shunned her predestination in favour of the changes promised by the Edge of Daybreak."
"A great path for one who was born into the Imperium's bondage but shunned her predestination in favour of the changes promised by the Edge of Daybreak."

"A great path for one who was born into the Imperium's bondage but shunned her predestination in favour of the changes promised by the Edge of Daybreak."
"A great path for one who was born into the Imperium's bondage but shunned her predestination in favour of the changes promised by the Edge of Daybreak."

languages.text: "Ein großer Pfad für eine Frau, die in die Fesseln des Imperiums geboren wurde, aber ihre Vorbestimmung ignoriert hat — um sich dem vom Rand des Tagesanbruchs versprochenen Wandel hinzugeben."
languages.original_text: "A great path for one who was born into the Imperium's bondage but shunned her predestination in favour of the changes promised by the Edge of Daybreak."

traits.locale_text: "Ein großer Pfad für eine Frau, die in die Fesseln des Imperiums geboren wurde, aber ihre Vorbestimmung ignoriert hat — um sich dem vom Rand des Tagesanbruchs versprochenen Wandel hinzugeben."

languages.text: « Une voie royale, pour quelqu'un né sous la férule de l'Imperium, mais qui a renoncé à la prédestination afin d'opter pour les changements promis par la Lame de l'Aube. »
languages.original_text: "A great path for one who was born into the Imperium's bondage but shunned her predestination in favour of the changes promised by the Edge of Daybreak."

traits.locale_text: « Une voie royale, pour quelqu'un né sous la férule de l'Imperium, mais qui a renoncé à la prédestination afin d'opter pour les changements promis par la Lame de l'Aube. »

languages.text: “对于那些生来就要遭受帝国奴役之人来说，这是一条伟大的道路。破晓锋刃承诺我们，会为这个世界带来变革。”
languages.original_text: "A great path for one who was born into the Imperium's bondage but shunned her predestination in favour of the changes promised by the Edge of Daybreak."

traits.locale_text: “对于那些生来就要遭受帝国奴役之人来说，这是一条伟大的道路。破晓锋刃承诺我们，会为这个世界带来变革。”

languages.text: 「帝国の束縛の中に生まれたものの、暁の刃が約束する変化を支持し、宿命を回避した者には偉大な道だ」
languages.original_text: "A great path for one who was born into the Imperium's bondage but shunned her predestination in favour of the changes promised by the Edge of Daybreak."

traits.locale_text: 「帝国の束縛の中に生まれたものの、暁の刃が約束する変化を支持し、宿命を回避した者には偉大な道だ」

languages.text: «Un gran camino para quien nació en la esclavitud del Imperium pero rehuyó su predeterminación en favor de los cambios prometidos por el Filo del Amanecer».
languages.original_text: "A great path for one who was born into the Imperium's bondage but shunned her predestination in favour of the changes promised by the Edge of Daybreak."

traits.locale_text: «Un gran camino para quien nació en la esclavitud del Imperium pero rehuyó su predeterminación en favor de los cambios prometidos por el Filo del Amanecer».

languages.text: "İmparatorluk'un dizginlerine bağlı doğdum ve onun dayattığı yazgımı, Tan Vakti'nin vadettiği değişim uğruna kenara atıp bu şanlı yolda yürür oldum."
languages.original_text: "A great path for one who was born into the Imperium's bondage but shunned her predestination in favour of the changes promised by the Edge of Daybreak."

traits.locale_text: "İmparatorluk'un dizginlerine bağlı doğdum ve kendi yazgımı, Tan Vakti'nin vadettiği değişim uğruna kenara atıp bu şanlı yolda yürür oldum."
